properties.name: job.admin.password
properties.description: 管理员账号的密码(明文).

properties.name: job.server.connect-timeout
properties.description: 服务器连接超时时间，单位为秒.

properties.name: job.server.read-timeout
properties.description: 服务器接受数据超时时间，单位为秒.

properties.name: job.server.heart-timeout
properties.description: 服务器心跳超时时间，超时后会踢掉对应的machine.
